text: Enjoyed meeting with @NNFANALA this afternoon. We discussed workforce shortages and retention problems, which have been exacerbated by the pandemic. I am grateful for the work they do to provide Nebraskans with quality care. https://t.co/7jUpvX7qv9

Question from last night on @Jeopardy…
 
ANSWER: Who is Maya Angelou? 
 
Proud to have sponsored a bill creating the American Women Quarters Program that Congress passed in 2020. It created coins that highlight women trailblazers in American history. https://t.co/1tJBTEfRwr

Today we remember the sacrifice & bravery of the men who stormed the beaches of Normandy 78 years ago. We will never forget the Greatest Generation’s actions to defend freedom and defeat evil. #DDay https://t.co/RcCrMXFsVb

Great visiting with small business owners yesterday in Hastings. We discussed the supply chain, inflation and other challenges facing small businesses. It was especially wonderful to see young entrepreneurs making Hastings their home. https://t.co/3ult2j5GaQ

Recently met with staff at Allo Communications, a Nebraska-based company, here in Hastings. Their ongoing efforts to provide Nebraskans with access to fiber-optic services will have positive impacts on our communities for years to come. https://t.co/QUrPkOPrE7

Thrilled to participate in today’s ribbon-cutting ceremony for Charles Drew Health Center’s new teen/young adult facility.
 
This center is going to provide excellent physical, mental, and behavioral health care for many young Nebraskans in Omaha. https://t.co/e4GsKRzgwk
